articles.description: Moderna Inc said on Thursday it expects to have between 100 million and 125 million doses of its experimental COVID-19 vaccine available globally in the first quarter of 2021.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: Vials with a sticker reading, "COVID-19 / Coronavirus vaccine / Injection only" and a medical syringe are seen in front of a displayed Moderna logo in this illustration … [+885 chars]

articles.author: Arden Dier

articles.content:

articles.author: Melissa Repko
articles.title: Walmart gives bonuses to employees, extends emergency leave as pandemic worsens - CNBC
articles.description: The big-box retailer has hired more than half a million employees since March to restock groceries, ship online orders and serve customers.
articles.content: Walmart said Thursday it will pay another pandemic-related bonus to hourly employees and extend its Covid-19 emergency leave policy to July as the U.S. hits records for coronavirus deaths and hospita… [+2577 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Browne
articles.title: Facebook to remove misinformation about Covid vaccines - CNBC
articles.description: Facebook says it will now "start removing false claims about these vaccines that have been debunked by public health experts."
articles.content:
Facebook said Thursday it will start removing misinformation about coronavirus vaccines as countries around the world prepare to start rolling them out.
